file_content.text: [The airlock leading into Attis Station is sealed tight. Someone has shot out the keypad.]
Fried to a proverbial crisp. Crude, but sadly quite effective.
Permacrete detonator would open it. If you don't mind a landslide.
Sorry. There are Imperial soldiers wandering around. I had to hide for a bit.
Is there a way to open this door without the codes?
You should always be mindful of your welfare. But I could use your help.
Oh! Let me take care of that. We built in a manual release just in case. Now, where....
Save your little adventure for someone else. I need to get inside.
I didn't mean to... I'll get the manual release for you.
It's awfully quiet in there. I hope everyone's alright.
I have to get this door closed before the atmosphere contaminates the station. I'll meet you inside.
[This airlock is sealed, and the keypad has been destroyed.]
